#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define MP make_pair
#define F first
#define S second
#define PB push_back
#define ll long long int
#define INF 1e15
using namespace std;
int a[1010];
int k,n;
bool solve(ll x)
{
      ll sum=0;
      for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
      {
            sum+=(x/a[i]);
      }
      if(sum>=n)
            return true;
      return false;
}
int main()
{
      ll x,b,mid;
      cin>>k>>n;
      for(ll i=0;i<k;i++)
      {
            cin>>a[i];
      }
      ll lo=1,hi=INF;
      while(lo<hi)
      {
            mid=(lo+hi)/2;
            if(solve(mid))
                  hi=mid;
            else
                  lo=mid+1;
      }
      cout<<lo;
      return 0;
}
